spec_data.Name: libvdpau
spec_data.Description:
VDPAU is the Video Decode and Presentation API for UNIX. It provides an
interface to video decode acceleration and presentation hardware present in
modern GPUs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 12 Oct 2017 08:23:39 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Wrapper library for the Video Decode and Presentation API
